1)next week is Druids and faeries

2)after that is Golems and towers.

3)then, it's Giant Skeletons and Fire Elementals.

4)skeletons and ghosts

5)clerics and archmages

6)proposed new character classes - not promotions or hybrids/dual 
class - each proposed new character gets 3 days before I move on 
unless discussion picks up.

7)orc captains

8)more proposed new character class - promotions of existing classes 
only - each proposed new character gets 3 days before I move on unless 
discussion picks up.

9)Game Issues of Health and Mana - yep, we will be talking about 
health and mana of characters for a week.

10)3 weeks on hybrid/dual class - we'll just have to wait and see why 
I want to handle this in 3 parts.

11)Game Issues of Speed and Teleporters

12)Game Issues of Generators

I am going to try to have a topic assigned for each week of this year 
because I want consisent and moderate amounts of discussion year 
round.
